location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists primarily of a letter between the Military Department in Clarence House, London, and the India Office regarding the location of Colonel Bourguin, a French citizen who left New Delhi for London to join the Fighting French. Both the India office and War Office are unsure of Bourguinâ€™s location.
